original_text:
Genghis’ Reel
Una figura mitologica che ha oltrepassato i confini dell’Oriente è di sicuro Gengis Khan, il condottiero che grazie alla sua forza e alla sua tenacia è riuscito a conquistare e ad unificare gran parte dell’Asia.
La componente grafica, come accade sempre con le slot World Match, ha un ruolo di primo piano nel ricreare la giusta ambientazione. Sullo sfondo troviamo una valle fiorita e qualche casa del villaggio in cui è nato Gengis Khan, la griglia dalla cornice dorata è invece sorvolata da un’aquila che avrà un ruolo nello svolgimento del gioco, ma che vedremo più in là. Ai lati ci sono dei fiori gialli mossi dal vento.
La musica è un jingle orientaleggiante con contaminazioni di suoni tipici dei film western.
Caratteristiche principali della slot
La griglia è una semplice 5×3, con 10 linee di pagamento fisse su cui è possibile puntare da un minimo di 0,01 € a un massimo di 5 €. Queste cifre si riferiscono al costo di ogni linea.
Si vince associando simboli adiacenti partendo dal rullo di sinistra e procedendo verso destra.
Si può impostare un numero di giri automatici compreso tra 5 e 1.000, o anche all’infinito.
All’interno del menù troviamo il cursore fast play, spostandolo verso destra si accelererà la rotazione di rulli.
Simboli e funzionalità di Gengis Khan
I simboli non tematici sono solo 4: J, Q, K, A. Come in tutte le slot, anche qui hanno un basso valore.
Per vedere somme più consistenti bisogna puntare sugli stivali, il tesoro e la scimitarra o, se siamo particolarmente fortunati, sul lupo e sulla regina.
Gengis Khan è il nostro simbolo Wild. Ricopre la funzione di Jolly, e va a sostituire tutti i simboli, tranne quelli speciali. Quando compare su un rullo sorvolato dall’aquila, allora si espande in verticale, aumentando le nostre possibilità di ottenere combinazioni vincenti.
Se durante i Free Spins, il simbolo Wild compare sul primo rullo, in modo random alcuni simboli diventeranno a loro volta Wild.
Un altro simbolo speciale è lo scudo con impresso un moltiplicatore x2. In base al numero di scudi atterrati sui rulli, il moltiplicatore può raggiungere x8.
Il cavallo è il simbolo Scatter e ci ricompensa con un numero di giri gratuiti compreso tra 3 e 7.

raw_translation.response:
"Genghis' Reel" is a slot game featuring the legendary figure of Genghis Khan, the conqueror who unified much of Asia through his strength and tenacity. The graphics play a prominent role in setting the scene, with a background of a flowery valley and village homes where Genghis Khan was born. The golden-framed grid is overshadowed by an eagle, which will play a role in the game. Oriental-sounding music with elements of Western film sounds accompany the game.

The game features a simple 5x3 grid with 10 fixed paylines, allowing betting from €0.01 to €5 per line. The game follows a standard slot mechanism, where adjacent symbols starting from the left reel form winning combinations. The game offers an automatic spin feature that can be set between 5 and 1,000 spins or infinite. A fast play option quickens reel rotations.

The non-themed symbols are card symbols J, Q, K, and A. Bigger wins come from betting on boots, treasure, scimitars, the wolf, or the queen. The Wild symbol is Genghis Khan, which substitutes for all symbols except the special ones. When the Wild symbol lands on a reel overshadowed by an eagle, it expands vertically for greater winning potential. During Free Spins, Wild symbols that appear at random can turn some symbols wild. The shield symbol with an x2 multiplier can multiply winnings up to x8 based on the number of shields appearing on reels, while the horse acts as the Scatter symbol, rewarding players with 3 to 7 free spins.

raw_translation.response:
Genghis’ Reel
A legendary figure that has surpassed the boundaries of the East is none other than Genghis Khan, the commander who, thanks to his strength and tenacity, managed to conquer and unify much of Asia.

As expected from a top-notch slot game from World Match, the graphics are essential to create the right atmosphere. In the background, we can see a flowery valley and some village houses where Genghis Khan was born. The Golden-framed grid is, instead, dominated by an eagle that will play a role in the game, but more on that later. On the sides, there are yellow flowers swayed by the wind.

The music is an oriental jingle with western-style sounds mixed in.

Main Features of Genghis Khan Slot
The grid is a simple 5x3, with 10 fixed paylines on which you can bet from a minimum of €0.01 to a maximum of €5. These figures refer to the cost of each line.

You win by aligning adjacent symbols starting from the left reel and proceeding to the right.

You can set a number of automatic spins ranging from 5 to 1,000, or even infinite.

Within the menu, there is the fast-play cursor. Moving it to the right will speed up the reel rotation.

Symbols and Features of Genghis Khan Slot
Non-theme symbols consist of only 4: J, Q, K, A. As in all slots, they have low value.

To see more substantial sums, focus on the boots, the treasure, and the scimitar. Or, if you're lucky enough, bet on the wolf and the queen.

Genghis Khan himself is our Wild symbol. He covers the function of a Joker and can replace all symbols except special ones. When he appears on a reel flown over by the eagle, he expands vertically, increasing our chances of getting winning combinations.

During Free Spins, if the Wild symbol appears on the first reel, randomly, some symbols will also become Wild.

Another special symbol is the shield with a 2x multiplier. Depending on the number of shields landed on the reels, the multiplier can reach x8.

The horse is the Scatter symbol and rewards us with a number of free spins ranging from 3 to 7.

review_with_topics.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
review_with_topics.prompt:
Below is a review for the slot game "Genghis’ Reel".

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

Graphics and Audio
Gameplay and Features
Symbol Values and Paylines
Wild and Scatter Symbols
Overall Game Review

- The review must be very detailed
- No FAQ
- No Notes
- Respond with a JSON array, one item per topic (use the keys "headline" and "content")

Review: Genghis’ Reel
A legendary figure that has surpassed the boundaries of the East is none other than Genghis Khan, the commander who, thanks to his strength and tenacity, managed to conquer and unify much of Asia.

As expected from a top-notch slot game from World Match, the graphics are essential to create the right atmosphere. In the background, we can see a flowery valley and some village houses where Genghis Khan was born. The Golden-framed grid is, instead, dominated by an eagle that will play a role in the game, but more on that later. On the sides, there are yellow flowers swayed by the wind.

The music is an oriental jingle with western-style sounds mixed in.

Main Features of Genghis Khan Slot
The grid is a simple 5x3, with 10 fixed paylines on which you can bet from a minimum of €0.01 to a maximum of €5. These figures refer to the cost of each line.

You win by aligning adjacent symbols starting from the left reel and proceeding to the right.

You can set a number of automatic spins ranging from 5 to 1,000, or even infinite.

Within the menu, there is the fast-play cursor. Moving it to the right will speed up the reel rotation.

Symbols and Features of Genghis Khan Slot
Non-theme symbols consist of only 4: J, Q, K, A. As in all slots, they have low value.

To see more substantial sums, focus on the boots, the treasure, and the scimitar. Or, if you're lucky enough, bet on the wolf and the queen.

Genghis Khan himself is our Wild symbol. He covers the function of a Joker and can replace all symbols except special ones. When he appears on a reel flown over by the eagle, he expands vertically, increasing our chances of getting winning combinations.

During Free Spins, if the Wild symbol appears on the first reel, randomly, some symbols will also become Wild.

Another special symbol is the shield with a 2x multiplier. Depending on the number of shields landed on the reels, the multiplier can reach x8.

The horse is the Scatter symbol and rewards us with a number of free spins ranging from 3 to 7.

response.headline: Game Theme and Developer
response.content:
Genghis’ Reel is a slot game from World Match that revolves around the legendary figure of Genghis Khan, the conqueror who managed to unify much of Asia thanks to his strength and tenacity. Let's just hope that you too can conquer the reels and win big with this game.

As you play the game, you'll encounter symbols inspired by classic Asian culture - lucky coins, katanas, and even the traditional yurt tents. It's a refreshing change of pace from some of the more Western-inspired slot games out there. Plus, it's always important to learn about new cultures, even if it's through the lens of a casino game.

response.content:
Prepare to embark on a journey through a beautiful blossom-filled valley in Genghis’ Reel! The graphics in this game are as impressive as Genghis Khan's conquering empire. The delicate flowers and quaint houses in the background are the perfect contrast to the golden-framed game grid, featuring an intimidating eagle that will send shivers down your spine. You'll feel like a true nomad roaming wild, open lands.

And let's not forget about the sound design! The music in Genghis' Reel is an oriental jingle with a twist of western sounds. If you're lucky enough to hit the jackpot, the music will have you dancing and celebrating like you're at a Mongol Empire feast. The sound effects of the spinning reels and symbols are equally impressive and remind you of the galloping hooves of horses, Genghis Khan's favorite animal.

Overall, the graphics and sound design of Genghis' Reel not only make the game enjoyable to play but also transport you back to the Mongol Empire. So buckle up, grab your bow and arrows, and get ready to spin!

response.headline: Get Ready to Conquer with Genghis’ Reel Gameplay and Paylines
response.content:
Genghis’ Reel is an online slot game that will take you on a journey to conquer new lands and win big. The gameplay of this exciting game is pretty straightforward. The slot has a simple 5x3 grid with 10 paylines that are fixed. This means that players have to play all 10 paylines. But don't worry, the game offers plenty of opportunities to win big.

Players can start betting from as low as €0.01, which is perfect for penny pinchers, and increase up to €5 per line for the high rollers. Wins are formed by aligning adjacent symbols from the left to right. So, you have to make sure you start your conquest from the left to increase your chances of winning big wins.

If you're feeling lazy and don't feel like spinning the reels every time, Genghis’ Reel has got you covered. You can activate the automatic spin feature ranging from 5 to 1,000 or even infinite. This means that you can sit back, relax, and watch your money grow. But if you want to speed up things, the fast-play cursor is at your disposal. It will speed up the reel rotation and make your conquest faster.

In short, Genghis’ Reel is perfect for players who love simple gameplay that offers a lot of opportunities to win big.

response.headline: Symbols and Rewards
response.content:
Get ready for a battle of symbols and rewards in Genghis’ Reel! Don’t expect any playing cards here as even the symbols with low value are theme-related. You’ll come across the boots, treasure, and sword symbols that will provide hefty rewards. And if you’re lucky enough, the wolf and queen symbols can shower you with significant payouts that will make you feel like a true warrior.

Nevertheless, the real prize comes when you spot Genghis Khan himself, the Wild symbol that can replace any other regular symbols on the reels. But wait! There’s more! When the eagle flies over any reel with Genghis Khan, he expands vertically and increases your chances of getting winning combinations. Talk about a powerful duo! It’s like having Batman and Robin working together to defeat Gotham City’s villains.

In addition to that, the shield symbol with the 2x multiplier can boost your winnings even further. The more shields you land, the bigger the multiplier, and you could be looking at an incredible x8 multiplier, which is just as amazing as finding a needle in a haystack.

response.headline: Exploring the Gameplay and Features of Genghis’ Reel
response.content:
If you're looking for a slot game that’s simple, easy to use, and offers fantastic features for all players to enjoy, Genghis’ Reel is right up your alley. This 5x3 grid slot with ten fixed paylines offers a betting range between €0.01 and €5 per payline. And I have to say, it's an excellent slot game to spin if you're new to playing slots.

But don't let the simplicity of the game fool you; there is a variety of winning combinations you can achieve. Winning combinations are made by aligning adjacent symbols from the left reel to the right one. This means that you won't have to worry about scouring the board for value symbols as you might with other slot games.

Are you a busy bee who doesn't have time to keep hitting the spin button? Fear not because Genghis’ Reel also offers an automatic spin option that ranges from an easy-breezy five spins up to a mind-boggling 1,000 spins or infinite! This option is a definite plus, especially if you enjoy playing on multiple devices or even on the go.

But that's not all. You can also adjust the game's settings to match your preferences from the menu. Choose to play on fast mode or enjoy other features that will make your gaming experience all the more worth it.

If you're in dire need of a good laugh, then let me tell you about my experience playing Genghis’ Reel. At one point, I accidentally hit the max bet button. It was a bit of a shock to see my balance drop to zero within the first few seconds of playing. It took me a while to recover from that. What I learned from that experience is always to double-check first before getting too excited and hitting the max bet button!

Overall, Genghis' Reel is a fantastic slot game. It's simple, easy to use, and the automatic spin option is perfect for those who don't have enough time to keep hitting the spin button manually. Make sure to give Genghis’ Reel a spin and tell us what you think!

Genghis Khan is the ultimate symbol of power and he is the Wild symbol in this game. He can replace all other symbols except for special ones, making it easier to create winning combinations. The shield with a 2x multiplier is another special symbol that you'll definitely want to watch out for. It can bring up to an x8 multiplier, which means even bigger payouts for lucky players. And speaking of luck, the horse symbol is the Scatter symbol in this game, and it rewards players with three to seven free spins. Who knew that a horse could be so generous?

Overall, 'Genghis’ Reel' is a slot game that truly delivers when it comes to Wild and Scatter symbols. If you're a fan of exciting and unpredictable gameplay, this is the game for you. So saddle up and prepare for a wild ride!

Review:
 
Game Theme and Developer

Genghis’ Reel is a slot game from World Match that revolves around the legendary figure of Genghis Khan, the conqueror who managed to unify much of Asia thanks to his strength and tenacity.

Graphics and Sound Design

The graphics of Genghis’ Reel are essential in creating a great atmosphere. The background shows a flowery valley and some village houses where Genghis Khan was born. The Golden-framed grid is dominated by an eagle, and there are yellow flowers on the sides. The music is an oriental jingle with western-style sounds mixed in.

Gameplay and Paylines

Genghis’ Reel has a simple 5x3 grid with 10 fixed paylines. Players can bet from a minimum of €0.01 to a maximum of €5 per line. Wins are formed by aligning adjacent symbols starting from the left reel and proceeding to the right. The game also features automatic spins ranging from 5 to 1,000 or even infinite, and a fast-play cursor to speed up the reel rotation.

Symbols and Rewards

Genghis’ Reel has four non-theme symbols: J, Q, K, and A, which have low value. The boots, treasure, and scimitar symbols offer more substantial sums, while the wolf and queen symbols can provide significant payouts. The Wild symbol is Genghis Khan himself, and he can replace all other regular symbols except special ones. When he appears on a reel flown over by the eagle, he expands vertically, increasing the chances of getting winning combinations. The shield with a 2x multiplier is another special symbol, and the multiplier can reach up to x8 depending on the number of shields landed. 

Wild and Scatter Symbols

Genghis Khan is the Wild symbol, and he expands vertically when flying over an eagle. When the Wild symbol appears on the first reel during Free Spins, some random symbols become Wild. The horse symbol is the Scatter symbol, and it rewards players with a number of free spins that range from 3 to 7.

meta.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
meta.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Genghis’ Reel".

Please provide the following:

- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we like". (4 bullet points)
- Bullet lists briefly covering the topic "What we don't like". (2 bullet pints)
- SEO optimized meta title with a maximum length of 45 characters. Include the words "play" and "free". Capitalize according to AP rules.
- SEO optimized, neutral meta description, explaining the review with a maximum length of 20 words. Include the words "play" and "free".

Respond with a JSON using the keys "pros" (simple array), "cons" (simple array), "meta_title" and "meta_description". 

Review:
 
Graphics and Audio

Genghis’ Reel features excellent graphics that bring the legend of Genghis Khan to life. With an eagle flying over the reels and a flowery valley in the background, players are transported to ancient Asia. The sound effects and music blend oriental melodies with western-style sounds.

Gameplay and Features

Genghis’ Reel has a simple 5x3 grid with 10 fixed paylines. Players can bet from €0.01 to €5 per payline. Winning combinations are made by aligning adjacent symbols starting from the left reel and proceeding to the right. The game features an automatic spin option, which ranges from 5 to 1,000 or infinite. Fast-play and other settings can also be adjusted from the menu.

Symbol Values and Paylines

There are four non-themed symbols in Genghis’ Reel (J, Q, K, A) with low value. Players can aim for higher sums with the boots, treasure, and scimitar symbols or by landing the wolf and queen symbols. There are 10 fixed paylines, and players win by aligning adjacent symbols starting from the left reel and proceeding to the right.

Wild and Scatter Symbols

Genghis Khan is the Wild symbol and can replace all symbols except special ones. If the Wild symbol appears on a reel flown over by the eagle, it expands vertically, increasing the chances of winning combinations. The shield with a 2x multiplier is another special symbol that can bring up to an x8 multiplier. The horse symbol is the Scatter and rewards players with three to seven free spins.

Overall Game Review

Genghis’ Reel is a simple yet exciting slot game that features excellent graphics and a soundtrack that immerses players in the world of Genghis Khan. With a Wild symbol that expands and the potential for a multiplier up to x8, players have the chance to win big. The Scatter symbol also adds an extra layer of excitement by rewarding players with free spins. Overall, Genghis’ Reel is a game that is definitely worth a spin!

faq.question: What is the minimum bet for Genghis' Reel?
faq.answer: The minimum bet per line is €0.01.

faq.question: What is the maximum bet for Genghis' Reel?
faq.answer: The maximum bet per line is €5.

faq.question: How many paylines are there in Genghis' Reel?
What is the Wild symbol in Genghis' Reel?
faq.answe: The Wild symbol is Genghis Khan himself. He can replace all symbols except special ones and expands when flown over by an eagle.

faq.question: What is the Scatter symbol in Genghis' Reel?
faq.answer: The Scatter symbol is a horse and rewards players with a number of free spins ranging from 3 to 7.

faq.question: What is the multiplier symbol in Genghis' Reel?
faq.answer: The multiplier symbol is a shield with a multiplier of 2x. Depending on the number of shields landed, the multiplier can reach x8.

faq.question: What is the maximum number of automatic spins in Genghis' Reel?
faq.answer: The maximum number of automatic spins you can set is 1,000 or even infinite.

faq.question: What is the fast-play cursor in Genghis' Reel?
faq.answer: The fast-play cursor speeds up the reel rotation when moved to the right.

faq.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
faq.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Genghis’ Reel".

Please provide an FAQ:

- 8 questions
- Use simple language and provide practical takeaways.
- Respond with a JSON!
- Use the key "faq" and an array with the keys "question" and "answer". 

Review: Genghis’ Reel
A legendary figure that has surpassed the boundaries of the East is none other than Genghis Khan, the commander who, thanks to his strength and tenacity, managed to conquer and unify much of Asia.

As expected from a top-notch slot game from World Match, the graphics are essential to create the right atmosphere. In the background, we can see a flowery valley and some village houses where Genghis Khan was born. The Golden-framed grid is, instead, dominated by an eagle that will play a role in the game, but more on that later. On the sides, there are yellow flowers swayed by the wind.

The music is an oriental jingle with western-style sounds mixed in.

Main Features of Genghis Khan Slot
The grid is a simple 5x3, with 10 fixed paylines on which you can bet from a minimum of €0.01 to a maximum of €5. These figures refer to the cost of each line.

You win by aligning adjacent symbols starting from the left reel and proceeding to the right.

You can set a number of automatic spins ranging from 5 to 1,000, or even infinite.

Within the menu, there is the fast-play cursor. Moving it to the right will speed up the reel rotation.

Symbols and Features of Genghis Khan Slot
Non-theme symbols consist of only 4: J, Q, K, A. As in all slots, they have low value.

To see more substantial sums, focus on the boots, the treasure, and the scimitar. Or, if you're lucky enough, bet on the wolf and the queen.

Genghis Khan himself is our Wild symbol. He covers the function of a Joker and can replace all symbols except special ones. When he appears on a reel flown over by the eagle, he expands vertically, increasing our chances of getting winning combinations.

During Free Spins, if the Wild symbol appears on the first reel, randomly, some symbols will also become Wild.

Another special symbol is the shield with a 2x multiplier. Depending on the number of shields landed on the reels, the multiplier can reach x8.

The horse is the Scatter symbol and rewards us with a number of free spins ranging from 3 to 7.

faq.question: What is the minimum and maximum bet for Genghis Khan slot?
faq.answer: You can bet from a minimum of €0.01 to a maximum of €5 on each of the 10 fixed paylines.

faq.question: What is the grid size and paylines of Genghis Khan slot?
faq.answer: The grid is a 5x3 with 10 fixed paylines.

faq.question: What are the Wild and Scatter symbols of Genghis Khan slot?
faq.answer: Genghis Khan himself is the Wild symbol while the horse is the Scatter symbol.

faq.question: What is the role of the eagle in Genghis Khan slot?
faq.answer: The eagle plays a role in increasing our chances of getting winning combinations when the Wild symbol appears on a reel flown over by it.

faq.question: Can the Wild symbol expand during the game in Genghis Khan slot?
faq.answer: Yes, the Wild symbol can expand vertically and increase our chances of getting winning combinations when it appears on a reel flown over by the eagle.

faq.question: What is the multiplier symbol in Genghis Khan slot?
faq.answer: The shield symbol comes with a 2x multiplier which can reach up to x8 depending on the number of shields landed on the reels.

faq.question: What is the maximum number of free spins one can win in Genghis Khan slot?
faq.answer: The maximum number of free spins one can win is 7.

faq.question: Can I set automatic spins in Genghis Khan slot?
faq.answer: Yes, you can set a number of automatic spins ranging from 5 to 1,000 or even infinite.
